Text: Kele Jihofa, O onugo-mi;
Kele Jihofa, O onugo-mi,
owñ ki atʼudu du kʼe̩ fe̩ no̩ chʼuwe̩ ele,
kʼi agbʼoji-we̩ tane̩ bʼolo̩ulu te̩,
kʼi aje̩ ñw o̩jo̩ udeju-we̩ ki che̩ko̩ ñw e̩nyo̩
Jihofa ache e̩wñ o̩kpakpa
I je̩ ñw Mose̩s ma o̩na o̩na-wñ kʼi ale,
Jihofa chʼe̩nejumomi kpai e̩numo̩la,
I akobʼone̩ e̩gba du n,
I che wa teju alu kʼadure-wa de̩ n,
Todu alu kʼefojale dʼatate̩ ñw ane̩ ile̩,
alu kʼolodudu jiji rʼolane̩,
Alu kʼata achejumomi amo̩ma-wñ,
Todu owñ chema e̩wñ ku ma ne̩ bo̩ wa;
I chʼe-one̩, olugbo-wñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼegbe;
todu afu ju lale oji-wñ, oñ i le me̩,
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Jihofa muda chʼakwo ogbegbele̩ tʼogbegbele̩
owñ chʼabo ku ma de alo-wñ
Jihofa la fʼe̩re̩ ede-wñ lonyane̩ efojale me̩,
Me̩ kele Jihofa, ame̩ amonuche̩-wñ,
Me̩ kele Jihofa, ame̩ uwewe e̩wñ e̩wñ chaka,
Kele Jihofa, uko̩lo̩-wñ chaka,
